content: ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 5hdc in the same space work 6hdc in each of the next 19 ch4-sps join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120hdc round 14 marigold join ar ound the post of any st in round 13 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120 surface sl sts 21 roun d 15 sand note be careful not to catch your surface slip stitches in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 6hdc ch1 this does not count as st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 4sts fptrc around the top of the dc4tog from round 12 skip st 1sc in each of the next 5sts fptrc around the top of the dc4tog from round 12 skip st 19 times join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 20fptrc 100sc 120sts roun d 16 golden yellow working blo join in any st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 11 9sts join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120sc 22 roun d 17 marigold workin g blo join in any st ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 119sts join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120sc round 18 golden yellow note be careful not to crochet your chains too tightly join in any st ch2 decrease over the next 2sts this counts as the 1st dc3tog ch3 dc3to g over the next 3sts ch3 39 times join to the top of the beginning dc3tog with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 40 dc3tog 40 ch3-spaces 23 roun d 19 golden yellow slip_stitch in to the ch3-space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 2hdc in the same space 4hdc in the next ch3- space 3hdc in the next ch3-space 4hdc in the next ch3-space 19 times join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 140hdc round 20 marigold join around the post of any st in round 19 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 140 surface sl sts 24 roun d 21 sand note be careful not to catch your surface slip stitches in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 4hdc ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 2sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 18 skip st 1sc in each of the next 2sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 18 skip st 1sc in each of the next 3sts fptrc around
